item.description:
Hi all - I finally got around to updating the location...same place as the past few times, as that seems to work well.

Also - I'll reiterate how important it is for people to keep their RSVPs current. If you're not absolutely sure you can make it, please keep yourself as a maybe. I will **try** to keep attendence this time (which means I'll probably forget).

Looking forward to seeing everyone again.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the large group of people vaguely discussing the book
item.name: Boston Readers: "Girl in Translation", by Jean Kwok
